text: Bosco Gurin or Bosco/Gurin (Walser German: Gurin / Guryn, Lombard: Bosch / GÃ¼rin) is a municipality of the district of Vallemaggia in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. It is the only municipality in Ticino where German is a co-official language.www.bosco-gurin.ch == References == == Other websites == * Official site
